content: @WG-rustc-dev-guide I don't remember if this section is kind of WIP or what but right now seems kind of disconnected from the rest of the content there
maybe it's better if that content is integrated into https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org/overview.html#what-the-compiler-does-to-your-code or something like that ?
maybe we could separate it into a different page? Having a link to specific parts of the code seems useful
yeah, unsure what's best, right now that section seems disconnected to me

Santiago Pastorino said:

maybe it's better if that content is integrated into https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org/overview.html#what-the-compiler-does-to-your-code or something like that ?

as I've said here, maybe merging it with https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org/overview.html#what-the-compiler-does-to-your-code section ?

Joshua Nelson said:

maybe we could separate it into a different page? Having a link to specific parts of the code seems useful

but in the lines of what you've said, maybe splitting the what part https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org/overview.html#what-the-compiler-does-to-your-code and the how part https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org/overview.html#how-it-does-it and then in the how part fixing a bit the titles and structure it may work, unsure :)
or maybe even it fits better in the following section https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org/compiler-src.html ?
also this section contains similar explanations, I wonder if we can merge those 3
